languages.text: Маттис Эрэбис верой и правдой служил Вольному Торговцу. Вера в Неумирающего Императора привела его в тенета Кровавой паутины, но вскоре юноша ужаснулся облику, который принял культ смерти под предводительством его сестры. Узрев в этих переменах кощунство против Императора, Маттис осмелился публично высказать несогласие. Судьба его была мрачна — Висирь своей рукой открыла его вены и вкусила посмертную кровь, на которой сделала расклад Таро Императора.

Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. His faith in the Undying Emperor entangled him in the Bloodspun Web, but the young man was soon horrified at what the death cult had become under his sister's leadership. Mattis saw the changes she had made as blasphemous against the Emperor, and dared to speak out publicly against her. He met a grim fate. The Vizsier opened his veins with her own hand, tasted his lifeless blood, and made a reading of the Emperor's Tarot with it.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis war ein loyaler und pflichtbewusster Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Sein Glaube an den Todlosen Imperator führte ihn in das Blutgesponnene Netz, doch der junge Mann war entsetzt, was unter seiner Schwester aus dem Todeskult geworden war. Mattis betrachtete die von ihr vorgenommenen Änderungen als Blasphemie gegen den Imperator und stellte sich öffentlich gegen sie. Dafür nahm er ein schlimmes Ende. Der Vizsier öffnete seine Venen, trank sein lebloses Blut und nahm damit eine Lesung des Tarots des Imperators vor.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. languages.text: Mattis Erebis était un serviteur loyal, entièrement dévoué {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Si sa foi en l'Immortel le poussa dans le giron la Toile de Sang, le jeune homme fut rapidement horrifié par ce qu'était devenu le culte de la mort sous la férule de sa sœur. Outré par les changements qu'elle avait introduits et qu'il considérait comme un blasphème contre l'Empereur, il mourut prématurément après avoir commis l'erreur fatale de dénoncer publiquement ses agissements. La vizir lui ouvrit les veines de ses propres mains avant de boire le sang tiré de son cadavre et de s'en servir pour lire l'avenir dans le tarot de l'Empereur.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. His faith in the Undying Emperor entangled him in the Bloodspun Web, but the young man was soon horrified at what the death cult had become under his sister's leadership. languages.text: Mattis Erebis fue un fiel y devoto sirviente de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su fe en el Emperador Inmortal hizo que quedara enmarañado en la Red Sanguinolenta, pero el joven pronto quedó horrorizado al ver en qué se había convertido el Culto de la Muerte bajo el liderazgo de su hermana. Mattis consideró que los cambios que había introducido constituían blasfemia contra el Emperador y se pronunció en su contra en público. Sufrió un cruel destino. La Visir abrió sus venas con su propia mano, degustó la sangre sin vida, e hizo una lectura del Tarot del Emperador con ella.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. His faith in the Undying Emperor entangled him in the Bloodspun Web, but the young man was soon horrified at what the death cult had become under his sister's leadership. languages.text: マティス・エレビスはローグトレーダーの忠実勝つ従順な従者だった。不死の皇帝への信仰によりブラッドスパン・ウェブへと絡めとられたものの、青年はほどなくして、姉の指導下で死のカルトがどういったものになっているのかを知り、愕然とした。マティスは彼女が起こした変革は皇帝に対する冒涜であるとみなし、あえて公の場で彼女に反抗の発言をした。彼は悲惨な運命をたどった。ヴィジールは自らの手で彼の血管を切開し、命を失った血を味わい、それを使って皇帝陛下の占い札を読み解いた。
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. His faith in the Undying Emperor entangled him in the Bloodspun Web, but the young man was soon horrified at what the death cult had become under his sister's leadership. Mattis saw the changes she had made as blasphemous against the Emperor, and dared to speak out publicly against her. He met a grim fate. The Vizsier opened his veins with her own hand, tasted his lifeless blood, and made a reading of the Emperor's Tarot with it.

traits.locale_text: マティス・エレビスはローグトレーダーの忠実勝つ従順な従者だった。不死の皇帝への信仰によりブラッドスパン・ウェブへと絡めとられたものの、青年はほどなくして、姉の指導下で死のカルトがどういったものになっているのかを知り、愕然とした。マティスは彼女が起こした変革は皇帝に対する冒涜であるとみなし、あえて公の場で彼女に反抗の発言をした。彼は悲惨な運命をたどった。ヴィジールは自らの手で彼の血管を切開し、命を失った血を味わい、それを使って皇帝陛下の占い札を読み解いた。

languages.text: 马蒂斯·伊雷比斯一直对行商浪人忠心耿耿，出于对不死神皇的信仰，他也加入了织血罗网的行列。但很快，这个年轻人亲眼见证了教派在他姐姐的统治期间发生的变化，为此惊惧不已。马蒂斯认为，她的所作所为是在公然亵渎帝皇信仰，便鼓起勇气公开反对她的统治。然而，他却落得了悲惨的下场。宿老绮贝菈亲手剖开了他的喉咙，品尝了他冰冷的鲜血，用他的鲜血进行了塔罗牌占卜。
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. His faith in the Undying Emperor entangled him in the Bloodspun Web, but the young man was soon horrified at what the death cult had become under his sister's leadership. Mattis saw the changes she had made as blasphemous against the Emperor, and dared to speak out publicly against her. He met a grim fate. languages.text: Mattis Erebis, Hür Tacir'in sadık ve vazifesine bağlı bir hizmetkârıydı. Ölmeyen İmparator'a karşı inancı neticesinde Kanipi Ağı'yla münasebet kursa da delikanlı, kısa süre sonra kız kardeşinin liderliğindeki ölüm tarikatının dönüştüğü şey karşısında dehşete düştü. Mattis, kardeşinin yaptığı değişiklikleri İmparator'a aykırılık olarak gördü ve açıkça ona karşı çıkma cüretini gösterdi. Akıbeti korkunç oldu. Vezir, Mattis'in damarlarını kendi elleriyle açarak cansız kanını tattı ve aynı kanla İmparator'un Tarotu'nu okudu.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. His faith in the Undying Emperor entangled him in the Bloodspun Web, but the young man was soon horrified at what the death cult had become under his sister's leadership. Mattis saw the changes she had made as blasphemous against the Emperor, and dared to speak out publicly against her. He met a grim fate. The Vizsier opened his veins with her own hand, tasted his lifeless blood, and made a reading of the Emperor's Tarot with it.
